sentences.en: After all, how many people can say they are effectively bilingual?
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 有多少人有条件说他们精通双语?

sentences.en: As the world gets smaller, bilingual skills are becoming ever more important.
sentences.cn: 随着世界变得越来越小, 双语能力也越来越重要了!

sentences.en: Bilingual : How do you adapt your services for Chinese customers?
sentences.cn: 你们如何来针对中国的顾客调整服务项目 呢 ?
双语教学班级更为流行.

sentences.en: Bilingual Time: Have you ever busked in your own hometown?
sentences.cn: 《双语时代》: 你曾在自己的家乡表演过街头艺术 吗 ?

sentences.en: Bilingual Time: When did you start this blog and what for?
sentences.cn: 双语时代: 您什么时候开始开设这个博客?目的是什么?

sentences.en: Chinese economy is getting more globalized. Bilingual is preferred.
sentences.cn: 中国的经济越来越全球化,这需要人们学会使用外语.

sentences.en: He is bilingual ( in French and Spanish ).
sentences.cn: 他操 ( 法语和西班牙语 ) 两种语言.

sentences.en: He is virtually bilingual in Spanish and Portuguese.
sentences.cn: 他实际上讲西班牙语和葡萄牙语两种语言.

sentences.en: Last week, when I was in MontreaI, the empIoyees there are bilingual.
sentences.cn: 上周, 当我在蒙特利尔的时候,那些店员还通晓两种语言.

sentences.en: Many parents oppose bilingual education in schools.
sentences.cn: 很多家长反对学校实行双语教育。

sentences.en: Shall I explain again why I'm doing bilingual writing?
sentences.cn: 还要再一次重述双语写作的原因 吗 ?

sentences.en: She had always been bilingual in Russian and English.
sentences.cn: 她同时学会了说两种语言,俄语和英语.

sentences.en: She is bilingual in English and Punjabi.
sentences.cn: 她会说英语和旁遮普语。

sentences.en: She works as a bilingual secretary for an insurance company.
sentences.cn: 她为一家保险公司做双语秘书.

sentences.en: The report proposed bilingual education in schools.
sentences.cn: 报告建议在学校中实行双语教学。

phrases.tran_cn: 双语词典；双语对照词典

trans.tran_cn: 双语的，两种语言的，能说两种语言的
trans.tran_en: written or spoken in two languages
